creditline: Gift of Carl Otto von Kienbusch, Class of 1906, for the Carl Otto von Kienbusch Jr., Memorial Collection

texts.textentryhtml: Sir Kenneth Metheson, Gledfield House, Scotland; Durlacher, London (1921); ?private collection, London; Myron Taylor, New York (by 1932-1952; sale, Parke-Bernet, New York, January, 1952, lot 95, to Kienbusch); Carl Otto von Kienbusch (1952-1965; gift to Princeton University Art Museum).
